kleeslabs.configuration.disabledCompat.t: IDs of mods whose compatibility should be disabled.
kleeslabs.configuration.dumpSlabs.toolti: For development purposes. Set to true to have KleeSlabs dump a list of items containing the word 'slab' in their name upon world load.
kleeslabs.configuration.mode.tooltip: Control whether KleeSlabs should trigger ALWAYS, ONLY_WHEN_SNEAKING or ONLY_WHEN_NOT_SNEAKING
kleeslabs.configuration.title: KleeSlabs
